text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a DSDLOC

name: RoleClassDedicatedServiceDeliveryLocation
title: RoleClassDedicatedServiceDeliveryLocation
description: A role of a place (player) that is intended to house the provision of services. Scoper is the Entity (typically Organization) that provides these services. This is not synonymous with "ownership."
